page.title: 05Hereford Cathedral.
page.content: On July 5th we visited Hereford Cathedral, and the first person we met was the{Precentor.}He told us all about the work that goes on in the Cathedral. He said there are 101 different jobs to be done. The Precentor looks after the Choir and oversees the activities that go on in the Cathedral.The Precentor is called a{Canon. The{Verger}helps keep the Cathedral clean. He carries a very heavy mace and wears a black and blue robe. The Cathedral has been damaged throughout the years and Herefordians have been raising money for repairs. On 8th April 1985 the{Prince and {Princess of Wales}visited the City to open the Restoration Fund. The Cathedral is the Mother Church of all the Churches in the Hereford {Diocese.
